subject: Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Toronto FC Coach John Carver resigned Saturday for personal reasons from a team with a 2-2-2 record. The assistant coaches Chris Cummins and Nick Dasovic will handle the coaching duties until a replacement is selected next week, the team said in a statement. Toronto FC will host Kansas City on Sunday.
